mapper.sql: id, open_id, privilege, likes, collects, pending_news, fulfilled_news
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, open_id, privilege, likes, collects, pending_news, fulfilled_news) values (#{id},#{openId},#{privilege},#{likes},#{collects},#{pendingNews},#{fulfilledNews})
mapper.update: update user set open_id = #{openId}, privilege = #{privilege}, likes = #{likes}, collects = #{collects}, pending_news = #{pendingNews}, fulfilled_news = #{fulfilledNews}
